text:
Hey team, looking to work with Emma Thompson for Big W. 
            Budget is approx $23,112 - need 2 x Twitter post, 2 x Product photography, 3 x 30-second Instagram reel, 2 x Twitter post, 1 x LinkedIn post. 7 weeks exclusivity, 5 month engagement. Usage: 6 months. Start date: September 2025. Need to confirm: exclusivity period
